long_description: The comfortable Marmot Ledge daypack is built tough to handle all the abuse you can dish out. It is equally at home whether you're on campus, commuting or camping out. Padded sleeve fits most 15 in. laptops; internal pocket is perfectly sized for a tablet or e-reader. Hydration port and hanger clip accommodate a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Small sunglasses pocket is lines with soft brushed tricot. Zippered front pocket, stretch mesh side pockets and tool/trekking-pole attachment help you keep your gear organized and accessible. Air-mesh back panel and shoulder straps create a comfortable harness; webbing hipbelt is removable. The Marmot Ledge daypack is made with 330-denier dobby nylon and reinforced with 420-denier high-tenacity nylon.
short_description: The comfortable Marmot Ledge daypack is built tough to handle all the abuse you can dish out. It is equally at home whether you're on campus, commuting or camping out.
